00216   const std::vector<std::string> &getHeaderValue(const std::string &key) { 
00217     std::map<std::string, std::vector<std::string> >::iterator iter;
00218     iter = m_Header.find(key);
00219     if(iter == m_Header.end())
00220       Err::errAbort("Don't recognize header key: " + key);
00221     return iter->second;
00222   }
